charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1101_010:
Iono, in need of advice, summoned
[Name:PlayerNickname ] for a chat.
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1101_020:
When they found her at the meeting spot,
Iono and her partner Pokémon really
stood out!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_030:
Nyahaha! THAT’S the reaction I was
waiting for!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_040:
Looks like you’re really feelin’ the presence
of Raging Bolt here!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_050:
I’m gettin’ EVEN MORE hyped for the day I
finally reveal it to my loyal viewers!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_060:
I draw a lot of attention just as my own
totally popular self...
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_070:
but with Raging Bolt by my side, my view
counts are gonna explode!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_080:
I’m actually planning on shootin’ a video
about Raging Bolt soon.
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_090:
But Paradox Pokémon are still mysterious
mysteries! So I wanna be careful how I handle
things, y’know?
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_100:
For Raging Bolt...and even when I partnered
up with Flutter Mane before...
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_110:
I wasn’t sure how to introduce ’em to the
masses. Part of me wondered if I should be
makin’ a video at all!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_120:
But I decided to just get me an expert and
GO FOR IT!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_140:
I’m thinkin’ of goin’ with a title like,
“Raging Bolt! Possible Raikou Ancestor?!”
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_150: I got the idea from a paranormal magazine.
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_160:
But I don’t even know what sort of Pokémon
Raikou is.
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_180:
C’mon! Tell me eeeverything you know about
Raikou!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_0401_200: It zooms all over at lightning speed?!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_0302_210: It has a roar like thunder...
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_0402_220:
Its roar sends tremors racin’ across
the earth?!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_230:
Sounds like Raikou’s a mysteriously mysterious
Pokémon too—just like Raging Bolt!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_240: It won’t be easy researching either of ’em.
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_250:
But I’m Iono! You won’t catch me throwin’
any towels before the job’s donesies!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_260:
I’mma dig up these mysteries and make your
popularity rise like a super-fast Eelektross
crawlin’ outta the ocean!
charaepi_ch0296_10_nanjamo/2301_1201_270:
Oh, this might be TOTALLY obvious, but when
I start shooting that Raging Bolt video...
